input_email_body:
Subject: Issue with Concurrent Integration Failures

Following a recent update to Node.js, multiple integrations have failed at the same time. There is a suspicion of compatibility issues You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.. We have already restarted the services, reviewed the logs, and confirmed the configurations, but the problem remains unresolved and needs further support. My name is Carlos Mendoza.
